spec.description: AWSManagedClusterTemplateSpec defines the desired state of AWSManagedClusterTemplate.

template.description: AWSManagedClusterTemplateResource describes the data needed to create an AWSManagedCluster from a template.

spec.description: AWSManagedClusterSpec defines the desired state of AWSManagedCluster

controlPlaneEndpoint.description: ControlPlaneEndpoint represents the endpoint used to communicate with the control plane.

host.description: host is the hostname on which the API server is serving.

port.description: port is the port on which the API server is serving.

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: infrastructure.cluster.x-k8s.io/v1beta2
kind: AWSManagedClusterTemplate
metadata:
  name: example-awsmanagedclustertemplate
  namespace: default
spec:
  template: {}
